name: Pyrrhic Generation
text:
ACTION: Exhaust this card to purge 1 units from your reinforcements. Then, place 1 unit of the same type from your reinforcements into a system that contains your units and no other player's ships.

ACTION: Exhaust this card to purge 1 of your leaders. Then, draw 1 relic.

name: Epigenetic Perfection
text: After you resolve a technology that instructs you to draw, gain, or place a component, you may draw/gain/place an additional component of that type from it's deck or supply following that technology's restrictions.

name: Heavy Rifle Hard Points
text:
While in space, each of your ground forces gain ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE 8.

After you use one or more ships' SUSTAIN DAMAGE abilities during a round combat, you may use your units ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE abilities in that system.

name: Diverse Strategems
text:
Before rolling dice during combat, you may exhaust this card to choose 1 of your units of each type. Those units roll an additional die.

If you have no units of a type left in your reinforcements, apply -1 to the combat value of each of your units of that type.

name: Ultrafine Satellite Array
text:
When you explore a planet, you may draw your card from the top the that deck's discard pile instead.

ACTION: Exhaust this card to explore each planet you control that contains one of your units with PLANETARY SHIELD.

name: Terradesic Dividends
text: After an objective is revealed, you may exhaust any number of planets to gain trade goods equal to 1 less than their combined resource or combined influence values.

name: Quantum Transport
text:
Apply +2 to each of your units capacity values that have one.

After you transport infrantry or fighters, you may exhaust this card to replace any of those units with an infantry or fighter.

name: Vacuum Transposition
text:
After you produce units, you may exhaust this card to move those units into a system containing your units and no planets.

After you perform your Hero's ability, place 1 frontier token in each system that contains your ships and no planets.
